articles.content: Kyoto, Japan -- Having more tools helps; having the right tools is better. Utilizing multiple dimensions may simplify difficult problems -- not only in science fiction but also in physics -- and tie … [+2966 chars]

articles.author: Douglas Helm
articles.title: NASA Finds Asteroid That Shoots Rocks All Over Space - Giant Freakin Robot
articles.description: An asteroid that shoots rocks into space? That makes the story from a movie like Armageddon seem a lot more complex.
articles.content:
NASA has discovered that the asteroid Didymos is spinning so fast it's throwing rubble into space.
NASA created the Double Asteroid Redirection Test (DART) to have a way to redirect asteroids headin… [+2960 chars]

articles.title: Humans will now begin to live on Mars l What is their martian home like? l How will they survive? - msnNOW
articles.description: Remember NASA searching for four volunteers to live on Mars last year. Well, that hunt is now over. Four humans will now begin to live on the red planet. What will be their living conditions like? Watch to know more.
